# services-firm-simulator Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2026-01-09

## Active Technologies

- .NET 10 (C#) for backend services, React 18+ (JavaScript/TypeScript) for frontend + Dapr (interservice communication, state management), .NET Aspire (observability, local runtime), ASP.NET Core (RESTful APIs), minimal React libraries (React Router for routing, native fetch for API calls) (001-hr-system-simulator)

## Project Structure

```text
src/
tests/
```

## Commands

npm test && npm run lint

## Code Style

.NET 10 (C#) for backend services, React 18+ (JavaScript/TypeScript) for frontend: Follow standard conventions

## Recent Changes

- 001-hr-system-simulator: Added .NET 10 (C#) for backend services, React 18+ (JavaScript/TypeScript) for frontend + Dapr (interservice communication, state management), .NET Aspire (observability, local runtime), ASP.NET Core (RESTful APIs), minimal React libraries (React Router for routing, native fetch for API calls)
